itemListElement.name: Pulled Butternut Squash Tacos. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe

@graph.name: Pulled Butternut Squash Tacos
@graph.description: These Pulled Butternut Squash Tacos have shredded Squash cooked in traditional Chipotle Sauce and served with crunchy slaw. Free of Dairy, egg, nut, soy, gluten,
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup + 2 Tbsp traditional Chipotle sauce  (or use bbq sauce + taco spice )
Or use my Chipotle Garlic Sauce  ((use less water))
a generous dash of chipotle pepper powder
Corn chia Tortillas or regular tortillas
Red cabbage slaw or shredded cabbage
Vegan sour cream or vegan chipotle ranch

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add oil and heat at medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add oil and heat at medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the squash and salt and cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the squash and salt and cook for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add Chipotle sauce, cumin, oregano, garlic, black pepper and chipotle pepper powder and water. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add Chipotle sauce, cumin, oregano, garlic, black pepper and chipotle pepper powder and water. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes until the squash is tender. do not overcook or overstir. Stir 2-3 times in between. Taste and adjust sauce, salt, spice.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes until the squash is tender. do not overcook or overstir. Stir 2-3 times in between. Taste and adjust sauce, salt, spice.

recipeInstructions.text: Layer greens and cabbage on the tortillas, add the squash, a drizzle of lemon juice, sour cream or chipotle ranch, guacamole, jalapenos and chopped cilantro. Serve warm.
recipeInstructions.name: Layer greens and cabbage on the tortillas, add the squash, a drizzle of lemon juice, sour cream or chipotle ranch, guacamole, jalapenos and chopped cilantro. Serve warm.
